An intern reused a prime when generating RSA keys for secure messages. Crack the cipher below using the key vulnerability. Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4354354883339357222343393438498419755128492251558765258631391767576702467126173034900372890474413698128661440561331294341389829557723863160834459712125578, ciphertext2: 2240641651414584290725894245392591573698317921886012347290539023317924265525406861903988614058163336679104783281614000457545061491131402602816110651935341

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7271943286406675900327386124411743709142532157477212796235040707123246134983467818656831331290222643158273912842766262897438274396083639463358743369892969, n2=8167116211745632108099280790197559542674063179326198673827781976882630751659641987142014458410990110822286891256110929059928216212844283778683626517197487, e=3358115454222786323427677465591363751087618498838835574227894935784935736664508190342735246653539315227546911739561032894154170416192516156413332035697849

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ho00kh7d}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4354354883339357222343393438498419755128492251558765258631391767576702467126173034900372890474413698128661440561331294341389829557723863160834459712125578, ciphertext2: 2240641651414584290725894245392591573698317921886012347290539023317924265525406861903988614058163336679104783281614000457545061491131402602816110651935341
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7271943286406675900327386124411743709142532157477212796235040707123246134983467818656831331290222643158273912842766262897438274396083639463358743369892969, n2=8167116211745632108099280790197559542674063179326198673827781976882630751659641987142014458410990110822286891256110929059928216212844283778683626517197487, e=3358115454222786323427677465591363751087618498838835574227894935784935736664508190342735246653539315227546911739561032894154170416192516156413332035697849
extra_info: p=66964392986510248039013490230442935325769701996504691932034716954248772873943, q=108594179116528159092195342464111672753780447039396147784834213127904561249983, r=75207679437235946815180785128045692399988065082886891835832987616091952003089, φ(n1)=7271943286406675900327386124411743709142532157477212796235040707123246134983292260084728292883091434325579358234686712748402373556366770533276590035769044, φ(n2)=8167116211745632108099280790197559542674063179326198673827781976882630751659458185283460694305082734694694733890957160547805933173223616577939630003944416
